title: Why do we sing the same song that we heard in the morning for the whole day? - Quora

response.answer_text: when we wake up in the morning our mind remains clear and fresh so when we hear some music which soothes our mind it provides us with much peace. So, for the whole day we try to be that relaxed and peaceful the way the song made us felt. probably that’s the reason we sing that song the whole day or there may be more reasons which i have not figured out.
